title: This Black Friday deal will make your Siri Remote jealous
content:
Macworld

Love your Apple TV but lose your sanity whenever you accidentally swipe past your streaming apps? It seems Apple forgot some buttons in favor of that sleek touchpad. This Siri Remote alternative is bigger and has more tactile buttons you’re already familiar with.

Pick one up on Black Friday for the all-time low price of $24.97 (reg. $39.99) before they’re sold out. This model has Bluetooth and infrared technology, working with Apple TVs tucked out of sight while still controlling your TV’s power and volume.

Instead of a thin, slippery design, this Bluetooth TV remote has a good feel and weight — so it doesn’t slide out of your hand and between the couch cushions. It’s also much easier to navigate your entertainment system, with a simple button to access the tvOS Control Center, app switcher, and extra buttons for fast forward and rewinding that the Siri Remote doesn’t have.

Want a better Apple TV remote? Don’t miss this Black Friday deal: $24.97 (reg. $39.99) while supplies last!
